name: Basil
label: Hot
description: Basil grows quickly and fresh basil can be added to almost any salad, stir fry, or casserole.  The flavor of fresh basil bursts into the dish.

comments.comment: This grew very easily for me!
comments.author: John Lemon

name: Carrots
description: Get ready for a color of organe you have never seen in super market carrots and a rich sweet flavor to boot!

comments.comment: This grew very easily for me!
comments.author: John Lemon

name: Blueberries
label: New
description: This bush has a longer growing period but once it starts producing berries, it never stops.  Fresh blueberries are loaded with anti-oxidants and are one of the few blue foods.

comments.comment: This grew very easily for me!
comments.author: John Lemon

name: Lettuce
description: Crispy lettuce grows quickly and can be used daily in fresh salads

comments.comment: This grew very easily for me!
comments.author: John Lemon
